When I was in College I decided to create an E Commerce so that I could apply all the knowledge I was learning there. That’s how Marshmallow Pie was born. An online store that sold personalized mugs made by me.


I developed the logos and banners for the website as well as a Facebook page and a blog. You can see below some of my banners.



I started the arts of the mugs with some sketches from different subjects. Then I would finish the art in the computer, get it printed and apply the art to the mug using a Hot Stamping Machine. This process is known as sublimation.
Below you can see some of my best mugs in a Newsletter made for the divulgation of the website.

This was for sure one of the most difficult jobs I’ve ever had. The reason is that I had to administrate my time very carefully, since I was working at home. It was a fantastic experience. I grew up a lot as a professional in this one and a half year.
